thread.title: Increased security for judges in Trump's immigration ban | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Increased security for judges in Trump's immigration ban | Daily Mail Online

author: Abigail Miller For Dailymail.Com
title: Increased security for judges in Trump's immigration ban | Daily Mail Online
text: Judges who upheld a ban on Trump's immigration order are given extra security after 'President's tweets lead to an increase in threats' Threats have increased against judges who upheld a ban on Trump's immigration order Law enforcement have not released specifics about the threats, which have increased as President Trump continues to tweet about judges A federal appeals court in San Francisco released its ruling on Thursday night on President Donald Trump's controversial travel ban They said they would not reinstate it Trump responded by taking to Twitter and writing in all caps: 'SEE YOU IN COURT, THE SECURITY OF OUR NATION IS AT STAKE!' Published: 16:22 GMT, 10 February 2017 | Updated: 05:09 GMT, 11 February 2017 94 shares
